column4: hi, since two days or so my laptops somethimes locks up during bootup. actually it locks up while loading the xserver, i would say. both keyboard and mouse are dead and my numlock and capslock are blinking - any idea what this could mean?
(also my Xorg.log is a lot shorter when bootup isn't achieved as to when bootup is completed
I dare to say that there is problem with the kernel
I've compiled kernel myself but without initrd it doesn't work so I fucked it up

i have the standard kernel, didn't compile one myself. the only thing that could have messed up something was i didn't have any free space on my root a few days ago (this actually caused the system to do pretty strange things...)
i had a look into kern.log but nothing too helpful there. any suggestions?
